name: Slot Car HTR+ : 3D Simulation
summary: How about a little trip back to the past with one of the most loved toys? Pull the trigger and put your tiny plastic bolide in a low flying in a huge variety of tracks trying to avoid be throw out by the other insane competitors. Start racing in 3 different difficulty levels and 20 tracks that include several challenges like loops, jumps, tricky crossroads, narrows and high speed curves. You can even build your own tracks with the highly intuitive track editor and share your tracks online with others players.
